name: Potion Toss Mania
description:
Game Description:

            Adventurous Brewers is a two-player competitive game in which players have to collect ingredients by harvesting plants that they’ve started growing, mixing them, and then brewing potions that are asked for by a list. Afterward, players can toss these to their opponent to change the environment on their opponent’s side and limit their moving area or make them drop. Each player has three lives and the first player to lose all three lives loses the game.

Game Objective:

            To defeat your opponent by tossing potions to make them fall off the map.

Player Controls:

PC/Mac –             

Control movementPlayer1  - arrow keys
Player2  - WASD keysGrab/drop objectsPlayer1  - right-ctrl key
Player2  - left-ctrl key
Adjust the throwing arc for potionsPlayer1  - right-shift keyPlayer2  - left-shift keyMain menuesc key

Controllers –   

Control movementXbox                  - left joystick
PlayStation   - left joystickGrab/drop objectsXbox                  - A button
PlayStation   - X button
Adjust the throwing arc for potionsXbox                  - X button
PlayStation   - ☐ buttonMain menuXbox                  - menu button
PlayStation   - start button Game Mechanics:
  • 4 finalized levels.
  • Real-time strategy mechanics.
  • Shared potion list that only potion brewed from the list can be crafted.
  • Shared seeds storage boxes/garden/pots allowing opponents to steal from other's completed order.
  • Completed brewing will generate three potions.
  • Picked up potions can be thrown at an arc.
  • Throwing a potion will destroy the environment it lands on.
